title: Day 2: Monday, Aug 26th
text:

title: Day 2: Monday, Aug 26th
text:
Lunch Options

üçî Burger (cheese options: American, Swiss, Cheddar, Pepperjack)
ü•™ Chicken Bacon Ranch Wraps (fried or grilled)
üçü Both options come with fries

title: Day 2: Monday, Aug 26th
text:
DESTINATIONS

Start: Indianapolis, IN

End: Evansville, IN

Hotel: Offers a free full breakfast starting at 6am

Depart hotel: 7:15am


1. üêÑ The Farm Connection (1hr 10min)

Address: 1363 E County Rd 550 S, Clay City, IN 47841, United States

Route: From I-70W, take exit #23 for IN-59, turn left onto IN-59S, in 10.6 miles turn left onto E. County Rd 550 S, destination is on the left in about 1.5 miles

Contact: Alan, Mary, and Kate (Cobb) Yegerlehner, swissconnectioncheese@gmail.com, 812-691-0254 (Alan‚Äôs cell)

Arrive: 8:30am

Depart: 11:00am

Gifts: 2-5



2. üçî Lunch in Sullivan @ Walmart/McDonalds (40mins)

Address: 757 W Wolfe St, Sullivan, IN 47882, United States

Route: IN-59 south to Clay City, just past Clay City right on IN-246 to US-150 (left) to Sullivan

Arrive: 11:45am

Depart: 12:45pm



3. üçâ Melon Acres (17min)

Address: 5388 E Gauger Rd, Oaktown, IN 47561, United States

Route: US-150 south, turn right onto E. Gauger Rd

Contact: Norm Conde (norm@melonacres.com), Autumn Freeman (autumn@melonacres.com)

Arrive: 1:00pm

Depart: 3:00pm

Gifts: 2



4. üçâ The Big Peach for Watermelon (9mins) (optional)

Address: 7738 N. Old 41, Bruceville, IN, United States

Note: Bring knife, cutting board, paper towels



5. üõí Pitstop in Vincennes IN @ Walmart (15mins)

Address: 650 Kimmell Rd, Vincennes, IN 47591, United States

Route: US-150/US-41 S exit on Hart St (left) then left on Kimmell Rd

Arrive: 4:00pm

Depart: 4:30pm



6. üè® HOTEL: Hampton Inn Evansville (59min)

Note: SWITCH TO CENTRAL TIME.


Address: 8000 Eagle Crest Blvd, Evansville IN

Route: US-41 turn left onto IN-68 then right onto I-69, take exit 7B for I66 W, then left onto Cross Pointe and left onto Eagle Crest Blvd

Arrive: 4:30pm (central time)

Happy hour: None

Bus parking: Free in lot

Dinner options: Texas Roadhouse, Cracker Barrel, Bar Louie-Evansville

Note: Carmen White will be meeting us at the hotel that evening. She will be flying in from Denver.
Running Total: 10hrs 53mins of bus time, 1070km travelled


Google Maps Route


Google map here: https://maps.app.goo.gl/jEjLeyBWBkjsmoqe9

title: Day 1: Sunday, Aug 25th
text:
DESTINATIONS

1. Pitstop OnRoute West Lorne

Route: 401
Address: 290 ON-401, Dutton, ON N0L 1J0
Arrive: 8:00am
Depart: 8:30am



2. Border & Customs (Detroit)

Route: I-75S to exit 37
Address: U.S. Customs and Border Protection, 2810B W Fort St #123, Detroit, MI 48216, US
Arrive: 10:00am
Depart: 11:30am



3. Lunch stop McDonald‚Äôs

Route: I-75S to exit 37
Address: 18787 Northline Rd, Southgate, MI 48195, United States
Arrive: 11:45am
Depart: 12:45pm



4. Pitstop SB Pipe Creek Rest Area

Route: On route between Fort Wayne and Indianapolis
Address: 35, Gaston, IN 47342, United States
Arrive: 4:00pm
Depart: 4:30pm



5. HOTEL: Hampton Inn Meridian Street

Route: I-75S then take US-24 W, I-469 S and I-69 S to E Ohio St in Indianapolis. Exit from I-70 W to E Ohio Street to E Washington St to N Meridian St.
Address: Hampton Inn, 105 S. Meridian Street, Indianapolis IN 46225
Arrive: 5:30pm
Happy Hour: None
Bus parking: $50
Dinner options: Nada (Mexican), Yard House, The Old Spaghetti Factory, Kilroy‚Äôs Bar & Grill
Note: Katelyn MacGillivary will be meeting us at the hotel as she is flying in from Wisconsin.



Running Total: 7hrs 36mins of bus time, 758km traveled

title: Day 3: Tuesday, Aug 27th
text:
üöé Bus time: ~5 hrs 30 mins

title: Day 3: Tuesday, Aug 27th
text:
DESTINATIONS

1. Breakfast at Love‚Äôs Travel Stop Calvert City KY (near Land Between the Lakes)

Travel Time: 1h 48mins
Route: Take I-69 S near Eddyville, it becomes I-69/I-24, continue onto Calvert City
Address: 2966 US-62, Calvert City, KY 42029, United States
Arrive: 7:30am

Depart: 8:30am



2. Griggs Farms LLC

Travel Time: 2hr 2mins
Route: Take US-79 to Simmons Rd, turn left onto Simmons Rd, turn left onto Gadsden-Todd Levee Rd, turn right onto Byrd Rd, turn right onto Byrd Rd, turn right onto Mason Grove Rd.
Address: 1511 Mason Grove Rd, Humboldt, TN 38343, United States
Contact: Matt & Kelly Griggs, robmgrig@hotmail.com, 731-420-0423 (Matt‚Äôs cell)
Arrive: 10:45am

Depart: 12:45pm
Gifts: 2



3. Late Lunch at McDonald‚Äôs in Dyersburg, TN

Travel Time: 45mins
Nearby Options: Chick-fil-A, Wendy‚Äôs, Walmart
Route: Mason Grove Rd to US-70A (left) to US-412 W to I-155 W to TN-78 S to Mall Blvd
Address: 2496 Lake Rd, Dyersburg, TN 38024, United States
Arrive: 1:30pm

Depart: 2:30pm



4. Peanuts

Travel Time: 1hr 18mins
Route: I-155 W to I-55 N. Stay on I-55N to State Hwy HH in Miner (exit 69). Turn right onto US-61/N Main St.¬†then left onto County Rd 452.
Address: 36.9745744, -89.6294617 (GPS coordinates)
Contact: Matt Deane, 573-475-0363 (cell)
Arrive: 3:50pm

Depart: 5:30pm
Gifts: 1-2



5. HOTEL: Drury Inn & Suites Sikeston

Travel Time: 14mins
Route: State Hwy & to US-61 S (right) to I-55 N to exit #67 to E Malone Ave (left) to State Hwy H
Address: 2608 E. Malone Ave. Miner, MO 63801
Arrive: 6:00pm
Happy Hour: 5:30pm ‚Äì 7:00pm with hot buffet
Bus Parking: Free
Dinner Options: El Bracero of Sikeston (Mexican), El Nopalito Grill (Mexican)



Running Total: 17hrs 3mins of bus time, 1657km traveled
